title: Excited about Recording again

embed.description: Guys! It is great to be back in the video making, Views or not i believe it is so fun. Love you guys. Thank you for watching and I would not turn off annotations. 1 Headphones warning in this video.

body:
*  Hey guys thanks for even considering this article, just got back into recording again. Tough times $ set me back but I'm on my feet again. I do this for fun. So happy to continue my hobby. If you would view this video and stuff would really help me in more ways then one. I have come a long way form being that noob everyone hated, to well now a gold player ^_^ long way to go but i want you guys to take every step with me.

Also I encourage your comments, on the video or on here.

replies.body:
I'd say.. You really, really need a new microphone =p
In a way it sounds like you're in space. So it'd be cool for Halo or so :D lol
